root.name: Hardwood Backgammon
root.description: Hardwood Backgammon is a game available to buy off the Xbox Live Marketplace, you can also obtain the game on the Xbox Live Arcade Unplugged disc.The aim of the game is to get all your checkers in your "home court." The game relies on luck and strategy. Your allowable moves are decided by the dice, but you must move your pieces in a fashion so as to give yourself the best statistical advantage.
